mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: The Malaysia Healthcare Travel Council (MHTC) is committed to facilitating and promoting the healthcare travel industry of Malaysia. We strive to position Malaysia as the leading global healthcare destination, offering world-class quality healthcare services to international patients.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To make Malaysia the preferred destination for world-class healthcare services, fostering sustainable economic growth through medical tourism while ensuring the highest standards of patient care and satisfaction.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Ensuring the highest standards of healthcare delivery through rigorous quality control and accreditation processes.

patientExperience.title: Patient Experience
patientExperience.description: Creating seamless and comfortable healthcare journeys for international patients with personalized care and support.

industryCollaboration.title: Industry Collaboration
industryCollaboration.description: Fostering partnerships with healthcare providers, facilitators, and industry stakeholders to strengthen Malaysia's healthcare ecosystem.

globalPromotion.title: Global Promotion
globalPromotion.description: Promoting Malaysia as a leading destination for healthcare travel through strategic marketing and international partnerships.

innovation.title: Innovation in Healthcare
innovation.description: Embracing cutting-edge medical technologies and innovative healthcare solutions to enhance patient care.

capacityBuilding.title: Capacity Building
capacityBuilding.description: Developing healthcare professionals and industry expertise through training, education, and knowledge sharing.

cta.title: Join Us in Shaping the Future of Healthcare Travel
cta.description: Connect with us to learn more about our initiatives and opportunities for collaboration.
